types.name: types_cfg_json_fp
types.desc: Path to all type spec file.

types.name: python_file_fp
types.desc: Path to python file to document.

types.name: subtype
types.desc: String describing what the type of a variable is.

types.name: desc
types.desc: String describing a variable's meaning.

types.name: dict_keys_d
types.desc: The definition for the dict that holds dict keys

types.name: restrictions_d
types.desc: The dict that holds restrictions for various objects.

types.name: var
types.desc: Name of a variable

types.name: spec_d
types.desc: The dict that holds the information about a single variable.

types.name: type_spec_d
types.desc: The dict that holds the information about all the variables.

types.name: func_name
types.desc: Name of function, no spaces and doesn't start with number

types.name: func_string
types.desc: multiline string of function

types.name: func_ret_str
types.desc: String defining what a function returns within this system.

types.name: start_end_d
types.desc: Dict mapping function names to definition's start and end line within file

types.name: func_name_to_locs
types.desc: Dict mapping function names to definition's start and end line within file

types.name: op_file_str_lines
types.desc: Output file in format list of strings, one string per line, no new-line symbol.

types.name: dict_key
types.desc: A key for a dict to add to doc str

types.name: num_depth
types.desc: Multiplier for spacers to show proper depth of variable

types.name: spacer
types.desc: Spaces which mark indentation level for doc strings

types.name: current_num_layer
types.desc: Keeping track of the layer in which we are operating for doc strings

types.name: crt_var_list
types.desc: Non-fixed data structure.

types.name: max_num_layers
types.desc: Upper limit to the layers in which we are operating for doc strings

types.name: variables_list
types.desc: list of variables normally returned.

types.name: docstr_l
types.desc: Passing type for infinite recursion reasons, this is a list with subtype list or string.

types.name: docstrs_major_l
types.desc: Outer list of layers of docstrings in sublists.

types.name: var2docstr_d
types.desc: Dict mapping variables to their docstrings

types.name: argsNret_d
types.desc: Dict mapping 'args' and 'returns' to a list of variables in def

types.name: funcN2vars
types.desc: Dict mapping function name to a dict holding variables

types.name: funcN2vars2docstr
types.desc: Dict mapping function name to variables mapped to doc strings.
